fire.title: Passion and Determination
fire.subtitle: Fierce determination and intense passion define Fire Nation individuals.

fire.title: Aggression
fire.subtitle: Firebenders can be aggressive in their pursuit of goals.

fire.title: Strength and Power
fire.subtitle: Firebending is characterized by its raw power and strength.

fire.title: Redirection
fire.subtitle: Firebenders can redirect lightning, symbolizing adaptability.

air.title: Flexibility and Adaptability
air.subtitle: Air Nomads adjust to changing circumstances with ease.

air.title: Spirituality
air.subtitle: Deeply spiritual, Air Nomads seek harmony and enlightenment.

air.title: Freedom and Detachment
air.subtitle: Air Nomads value freedom and detachment from worldly possessions.

air.title: Airbending Agility
air.subtitle: Airbenders are incredibly agile and nimble in combat.

earth.title: Strength and Resilience
earth.subtitle: Earthbenders are steadfast and unwavering in the face of adversity.

earth.title: Stability and Endurance
earth.subtitle: Earth Kingdom citizens endure hardships with patience and fortitude.

earth.title: Connection to Nature
earth.subtitle: Earthbenders draw strength from the land and the natural world.

earth.title: Defensive Abilities
earth.subtitle: Earthbenders excel in defensive techniques and fortifications.

water.title: Adaptability and Fluidity
water.subtitle: Waterbenders are adaptable and fluid in their movements.

water.title: Healing and Nurturing
water.subtitle: Water Tribe members value healing and nurturing abilities.

water.title: Connection to the Moon and Ocean
water.subtitle: Waterbenders draw power from the moon and ocean.

water.title: Ice Manipulation
water.subtitle: Waterbenders can manipulate ice for defense and transportation.
